name: Leona Women's Vintage Smooth Leather Heeled Boots
details: The Leona is packed with rugged features: a commando tread, an extra-empowering platform sole with a chunky heel, antiqued brass tunnel eyelets and a sleek silhouette. The result? A women's boot that strikes the perfect balance between femininity and the tough, rebellious Dr. Martens spirit.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired. We do not recommend the use of leather cleaners as they could damage the two-tone effect.

name: 1460 Smooth Leather Lace Up Boots
details: The 1460 is the original Dr. Martens boot. Its instantly recognizable DNA looks like this: 8 eyes, classic Dr. Martens Smooth leather, grooved sides, a heel-loop, yellow stitching, and a comfortable, air-cushioned sole. Now in more shades than ever.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired. We do not recommend the use of leather cleaners as they could damage the two-tone effect.

name: 1460 Women's Pascal White Virginia Leather Boots
details: More shades from the DM's archive: each season, we enhance our Originals collection with additional colors inspired by classic Docs designs. Made from Virginia, a grained leather that feels worn in from the first step, these boots stay true to their six-decade-old construction.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired. We do not recommend the use of leather cleaners as they could damage the two-tone effect.

name: Vegan 101 Purple Felix Rub Off Ankle Boots
details: With 6 eyes, the 101 sits lower on the ankle — but is still an instantly recognizable Dr. Martens silhouette. Clean, sharp and solid, the boot combines utilitarian work wear with classic lines, puritan stitching and unmistakable attitude. This version of the boot is 100% vegan, using a black synthetic material called Felix Rub-Off.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

details: The 1460 is the original Dr. Martens boot. Its instantly recognizable DNA looks like this: 8 eyes, classic Dr. Martens Smooth leather, grooved sides, a heel-loop, yellow stitching, and a comfortable, air-cushioned sole. Now in more shades than ever.

name: Vegan Pale Olive Smooth 1460 Lace Up Boots
details: With 6 eyes, the 101 sits lower on the ankle — but is still an instantly recognizable Dr. Martens silhouette. Clean, sharp and solid, the boot combines utilitarian work wear with classic lines, puritan stitching and unmistakable attitude. This version of the boot is 100% vegan, using a black synthetic material called Felix Rub-Off.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

name: Audrick Nappa White Leather Platform Lace Up Boots
details: A towering platform. With everyday wearability. These newly-evolved boots pack all the height of our renowned Quad platform into a cutting-edge lightweight construction. Set on an innovative two-part sole — a lightweight EVA midsole and PVC outsole with rugged deep cleats — they bring less weight and more attitude.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: 1460 Women's Pascal Yellow Virginia Leather Boots
details: The 1460 is the original Dr. Martens boot. Its instantly recognizable DNA looks like this: 8 eyes, classic Dr. Martens Smooth leather, grooved sides, a heel-loop, yellow stitching, and a comfortable, air-cushioned sole. Now in more shades than ever.

name: Vegan Lace Up Boots Blue Kembel
details: With 6 eyes, the 101 sits lower on the ankle — but is still an instantly recognizable Dr. Martens silhouette. Clean, sharp and solid, the boot combines utilitarian work wear with classic lines, puritan stitching and unmistakable attitude. This version of the boot is 100% vegan, using a black synthetic material called Felix Rub-Off.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

name: 1460 Pascal Military Suede Lace Up Boots
details: The Military effect has been used for centuries and was fully embraced in the hazy 70s. Our 1460 boot takes this technique for a wild trip with summer-friendly Marbled Suede. The 8-eye 1460 is fitted with antique gold eyelets and tonal laces. Grounded on a classic smoke AirWair sole punched with our yellow welt stitch. Signed off with a functional heel loop.
care: Lightly wipe away dirt with a damp cloth. Apply Dr. Martens Ultra Protector for an added layer of protection against dirt and stains.

name: Vegan 1460 Lace Up Boots Cherry Red Rub Off
details: Unmistakable vegan footwear. We've reworked our DM’s Original in eye-catching, high-gloss vegan-friendly black and purple Oxford Rub Off. The 1460 8-eye boot is detailed with black trims and black cord laces. Constructed on a smoke DMS outsole and secured with our signature yellow welt stitching. Marked with a distinctive vegan heel loop.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. We do not recommend the use of leather cleaners, as it could damage the finish.

name: 1460 Navy Smooth Leather Lace Up Boots
details: The 1460 is the original Dr. Martens boot. Its instantly recognizable DNA looks like this: 8 eyes, classic Dr. Martens Smooth leather, grooved sides, a heel-loop, yellow stitching, and a comfortable, air-cushioned sole. Now in more shades than ever.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam to the outside of your footwear to keep the leather supple, strong and smooth.

name: 1460 The Met Leather Lace Up Boots Multi Masterpice
details: Our first collaboration with The Met is a tribute to the enduring energy and inspiration of the work of Katsushika Hokusai — with our Original Icons offering a new canvas. Art should be seen everywhere. And our boots and shoes have miles to go. The Met 1460 boot printed with Hokusai’s ‘Under the Wave of Kanagawa’, or ‘The Great Wave’, as a homage to the world’s most recognisable piece of Japanese art.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

name: Vegan Jadon Max Platform Black Oxford Boots
details: Our highest, loudest boots are now available in our synthetic vegan leather. Built on our stacked 2 1/4 inch Quad Max sole. Kitted out with oversized eyelets and laces with metal aglets. Signed with our iconic yellow Goodyear welt stitches and AirWair heel loop. Relentless attitude. Zero animal products.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

name: 1460 Vonda Floral Leather Lace up Boots
details: The 1460 was the first Dr. Martens boot — and this one is true to the original, but borrows style from the 14-eye 1914 Vonda, with embroidered roses cascading down the side of the boot.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: Tarik Dark Brown Crazy Horse Leather Utility Boots
details: DM’s boots. Taken to the next level. Set on an extra rugged utilitarian outsole, our Tarik boot is a street-inspired silhouette built for maximum comfort. Made from Crazy Horse, a heavyweight leather with a tough, worn-in appearance and a comfortable SoftWair insole. Finished with hiker-inspired laces, yellow stitching and a black and yellow heel loop.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam to the outside of your footwear to keep the leather supple, strong and smooth. Once dry, buff vigorously to desired shine using a clean Dr. Martens Shoe Brush. Repeat regularly to prolong the life of your footwear.

name: Rainbow Pride LGBT Vegan Lace Up Boots
details: Our highest, loudest boots are now available in our synthetic vegan leather. Built on our stacked 2 1/4 inch Quad Max sole. Kitted out with oversized eyelets and laces with metal aglets. Signed with our iconic yellow Goodyear welt stitches and AirWair heel loop. Relentless attitude. Zero animal products.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

name: Jadon Boot Harness Black Leather Platforms
details: Strap in, buckle up — hold your ground. A tribute to generations of bold alternative subcultures who are fearless, fluid and faithful. The new Jadon Harness is built from supple black Paris leather and has a crossover of harness detailing on the upper, with a top ring on the vamp. The 8-eye boot stands tall on our grooved 2 inch Quad Retro sole and is fitted with tonal antique black eyelets and hardware.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam to the outside of your footwear to keep the leather supple, strong and smooth. Once dry, buff vigorously to desired shine using a clean Dr. Martens Shoe Brush. Repeat regularly to prolong the life of your footwear.

name: 1460 Swarovski Black Smooth Leather Lace Up Boots
details: The aesthetics of DM’s punk heritage enriched with Swarovski® crystals. Our 8-eye 1460 boot is constructed from our signature black Smooth leather with a safety pin and chain on the outer ankle, adorned with 3 Swarovski® crystals. A standout that crosses the divide between premium and subversion
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam to the outside of your footwear to keep the leather supple, strong and smooth. Once dry, buff vigorously to desired shine using a clean Dr. Martens Shoe Brush. Repeat regularly to prolong the life of your footwear.

name: Infant 1460 Softy T Leather Lace Up Boots
details: The 1460 I is where rebellious style meets small proportions. It's a scaled-down version of our classic 8-eye boot in Softy T leather for infants.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: Toddler 1460 Sticker Print Leather Lace Up Boots
details: Collectable stickers in DM's boot form. This sticker print is based on a new illustration by our Camden design team — a bold first pair for mini rebels. Built from Hydro leather with a reflective finish, the 1460 toddler boots have black eyelets and laces alongside our classic yellow stitching and heel loop.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: Toddler 1460 Wildhorse Leather Lace Up Boots
details: Collectable stickers in DM's boot form. This sticker print is based on a new illustration by our Camden design team — a bold first pair for mini rebels. Built from Hydro leather with a reflective finish, the 1460 toddler boots have black eyelets and laces alongside our classic yellow stitching and heel loop.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: Audrick Poly & Leather Platform Shoes
details: Our Quad Neoteric sole. Redefining DM's platforms — one lightweight step at a time. The two-part sole combines a lightweight EVA mid-section anchored by a cleated PVC outsole with a SoftWair insole for enhanced comfort from the first step.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: 1461 II Pisa Leather Platform Shoes
details: Live louder in softer leather. We’ve rebuilt our classic 1461 3-eye shoe in supple Pisa leather — ready to wear out of the box. The shoe stands on our grooved Quad sole secured with signature yellow welt stitching. Fitted with tonal laces.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: 8053 Leather Platform Casual Shoes
details: Live louder in softer leather. We’ve rebuilt our classic 1461 3-eye shoe in supple Pisa leather — ready to wear out of the box. The shoe stands on our grooved Quad sole secured with signature yellow welt stitching. Fitted with tonal laces.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired.

name: Voss Black Athena Leather Strap Platform Sandals
details: Our 2-strap Voss II sandal ready for the height of summer. A sleek, minimalist design built with PU-coated Athena leather for a smooth soft finish. For those days out that spill into a night out. Towering on a 3 inch Quad Zebrilus sole, for maximum elevation with minimum weight.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth.

name: Ricki Nappa Lux Leather Platform Gladiator Sandals
details: Next generation sandals. The Ricki Gladiator is set on our two-part Quad Neoteric platform - a radical rework of our renowned Quad sole, with a two-part lightweight construction, deep cleats and an exaggerated side profile. Made from easy wearing Nappa Lux leather, they add even more height with a statement 5-strap design, complete with our signature black and yellow heel loop and yellow welt stitching.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired..

name: Blaire Hydro Leather Platform Strap Sandals
details: Next generation sandals. The Ricki Gladiator is set on our two-part Quad Neoteric platform - a radical rework of our renowned Quad sole, with a two-part lightweight construction, deep cleats and an exaggerated side profile. Made from easy wearing Nappa Lux leather, they add even more height with a statement 5-strap design, complete with our signature black and yellow heel loop and yellow welt stitching.
care: Wipe away dirt using a damp cloth. Apply a neutral or correct colored wax based shoe polish. Buff with a Dr. Martens Shoe Brush to restore shine as desired..
